original_title: De como me tornei invisível pra caber em meu espírito
overview: In a Post-Human dimension, Images wage war against themselves, a creature needs to become invisible to survive. An experimental video-thesis based on research and methods of the invisible in the field of performance art, directly related to the non-binary transgender.  An intimate experimentation on identity processes, disappearance and witness.
title: De como me tornei invisível pra caber em meu espírito
